title: iboss - Digital Experience Metrics Report
description: This dashboard provides insights into end-user digital experiences by analyzing latency and response times across users, resources, countries, and assets.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides insights into end-user digital experiences by analyzing latency and response times across users, resources, countries, and assets.

For more information, see the [iboss Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/iboss/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

**Note**
- This dashboard is populated using metrics. Please follow the Configuration steps [here](/integrations/iboss) to enable metrics collection. Ensure the `Collect Digital Experience metrics` option is enabled to collect these metrics.
- All digital experience metrics are collected once per day, once the complete daily iboss report is available. Please ensure to set the dashboard time range to at least `Past 1 Day` to view the data.
- Filters:
  - `reporter_node` applies to all widgets
  - `user_name` applies to widgets in `Users` group
  - `resource_name` applies to widgets in `Resources` group
  - `asset_name` applies to widgets in `Assets` group
  - `source_country` applies to widgets in `Countries` group
